segments.advisor_message: Okay, so just to confirm, uh, you mentioned your son's name, right? Can you remind me of that again?
segments.client_message: Yeah, his name is, um, Jake, Jake Smith, I think.”,

segments.advisor_message: Got it! Jake Smith. And, uh, when was he born again? Like, his date of birth?
segments.client_message: Uh, it was, let me think... yeah, 15-04-2015. So he’s, um, six years old now.

segments.advisor_message: Perfect, thanks! Also, for how long is he going to be considered a dependent? Like, do you have a date for that?
segments.client_message: Um, I guess until he turns eighteen, so, like, 15-04-2033 or something like that.
